content.raw:
So this will take the pasted ssh deploy key and:

- replace new lines with \n  and send as options.

- the FC computer will read the deploy key from the cloudsim-options.json and register it in the machine's ssh-agent, to clone private github repo. After that it will kill the ssh-agent.

The deploy key is optional, allowing teams to provide public github repos
content.html:
So this will take the pasted ssh deploy key and:

  • replace new lines with \n and send as options.

  • the FC computer will read the deploy key from the cloudsim-options.json and register it in the machine's ssh-agent, to clone private github repo. After that it will kill the ssh-agent.

The deploy key is optional, allowing teams to provide public github repos
